column1: #Text=Aang says : " The Earth Kingdom city of Omashu !
#Text=We do n't have buildings like this in the South Pole !
#Text=" Sokka says : " They have buildings here that do n't melt !
#Text=" Aang says : " Well let 's go , slow pokes .
#Text=It could be dangerous if people find out you 're the Avatar .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You need a disguise .
#Text=" Aang says : " So what am I supposed to do ?
